CustomField.description: Specifies how Contacts in Data Import records are matched to existing Contacts. Contact Duplicate Rules runs all active Duplicate Rules for the Contact object to find the best match. Duplicate Rules are managed in Setup | Duplicate Management.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Specifies how Contacts in Data Import records are matched to existing Contacts. Contact Duplicate Rules runs all active Duplicate Rules for the Contact object to find the best match. Duplicate Rules are managed in Setup | Duplicate Management.
CustomField.label: Contact Matching Rule
